name: Gladhu Island
description:
Gladhu Island is a 2D strategy/sandbox game where you manage your settlers and resources, while expanding across the island of Gladhu.

See how your island turns out in 35 days!

Credits:

Designer, Programmer, and Artist - Pirhana#6433

Designer and QA - skarrx24#2015

Logo, itch.io game page, and QA - IamHaPPy#2536

Composer and SFX - humanpyramids#2964
